subject: Sports Injuries
Basketball
Knees
lead_paragraph: Tyson Chandler, who has a bone bruise in his knee, may play in the season opener. At this point, the Knicks can count on only two healthy starters.
snippet: Tyson Chandler, who has a bone bruise in his knee, may play in the season opener. At this point, the Knicks can count on only two healthy starters.
